sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Bin86 contains the as86, as86_encap, ld86, objdump86, nm86 and size86 programs.

sect3.title: as86
sect3.para: as86 is an assembler for the 8086...80386 processors.

sect3.title: as86_encap
sect3.para: as86_encap is a shell script to call as86 and convert the created binary into a C file prog.v to be included in or linked with programs like boot block installers.

sect3.title: ld86
sect3.para: ld86 understands only the object files produced by the as86 assembler, it can link them into either an impure or a separate I&D executable.
